com.cmput301.cs.project.adapters

Class TagsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • com.cmput301.cs.project.adapters.TagsAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TagsChangedListener

    public class TagsAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
implements TagsChangedListener
    Basic adapter that adapts a Tag to be viewable in a ListView.

    This class implements all methods in TagsChangedListener. You may use TagsManager.addTagChangedListener(TagsChangedListener) for this class to update the tags.
